Articles.Content: I thought I remembered reading on the site about a law or theory that addresses adding more fuel and heavier engines and how little you gain from doing that....or I may be mistaken....its been a while.
The phrase is "the law of diminishing returns," but it's just a saying, not a rigid law. Or were you thinking about something more specific?
Do you perhaps mean [The tyranny of the rocket equation](http://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/station/expeditions/expedition30/tryanny.html)?

> 
> Do you perhaps mean [The tyranny of the rocket equation](http://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/station/expeditions/expedition30/tryanny.html)?

I think that's the one....THANKS!
